title: TIMIA Capital to Acquire Controlling Interest in Specialty Finance Company - Yahoo Finance
content: TIMIA Capital to Acquire Controlling Interest in Specialty Finance Company  Yahoo Finance
description: TIMIA Capital Corporation ("TIMIA" or the "Company") (TSXV: TCA) (OTCQB: TIMCF), a leading innovator in specialty private credit, is pleased to announce it has agreed to acquire approximately 77% of a Canadian-based leading provider of specialty finance lending (the "Target"), for a purchase price of approximately $9.24 million. The total common share valuation of the specialty finance company is $12 million. The vendors of the Target (the "Vendors") and the Target's board and management are at
